label: Behavior 77327268
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 55.8362  0.0142 × t + 0.0008 × t², lon(t) ≈ 10.8198  0.0118 × t + 0.0007 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
